system.description: As precise and accurate as a well-crafted arrow, archers don't mess around. They prefer to keep their distance, as that is where they are the most effective, never letting anyone get too close to them. Archers are direct and focused and thus make the best guards. Ever vigilant, archers are always looking ahead as, if taken by surprise, they are easily killed. If you are playing an Archer be direct, and on target, sturdy and perhaps high strung, watchful of the future and of your back.

overview.base: You aim your weapon with deadly precision, causing weapon attacks you make to be warded.
overview.proficient: If the weapon attack is a ranged attack, then its range is doubled.
overview.fluent: If the weapon attack is a ranged attack, then its range is instead tripled.

system.requirements: You must remain stationary until you make the boosted attack.

overview.base: You may have up to 1 attack you make with a bow and arrow be UB on each of your turns.
You resist Disarm, have advantage on the roll made for Catch Item, and gain Missile Reflexes.
You may spend a short rest setting up a watch on an area. You and your allies that are in this area during the short rest or when combat begins may each spend 1 MP to gain Cat Sense.

system.requirements: You remain in the targeted area.

overview.base: You can see Ethereal creatures and have advantage on checks made with Perceive.
You resist the attack.

system.trigger: You would be hit by a ranged weapon or missile delivery attack.
